nodes.text: Battle of the Sy Myrth system

Sometime between 3973 BBY and 3965 BBY, during the early years of the conflict known as the Mandalorian Wars, a battle was fought in the Sy Myrth system between the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders and the Galactic Republic. The battle in the Sy Myrth star system ended in a Mandalorian victory, and it was preceded by a like outcome in the Jaminere system. The Neo-Crusaders then went on to raid the Taskeed system.

The battle in the Sy Myrth system was referenced in 2009's The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry. The battle was only marked on the galaxy-wide map of the Mandalorian Wars instead of being described in prose.
